titleStmt.title: The Christian Commonvvealth: or, The civil policy of the rising kingdom of Jesus Christ. Written before the interruption of the government, by Mr. John Eliot, teacher of the Church of Christ at Roxbury in New-England. And now published (after his consent given) by a server of the season.
titleStmt.author: Eliot, John, 1604-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Livewell Chapman, at the Crown in Popes-Head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
